channel.title: Warclights on The Archives Unleashed Project
channel.description: Recent content in Warclights on The Archives Unleashed Project

item.title: Warclight
item.description: Warclight is a Project Blacklight based Rails engine that supports the discovery of web archives held in the WARC and ARC formats. It allows faceted full-text search, record view, and other advanced discovery options. Want to know more? You can visit our example engine here, or our GitHub repository here.
